title: jayamangaLam nithya subamangaLam
sahitya:
jayamangaLam nitya shubhamangaLam



caraNam 1



mangaLam avani sutA nAthuniki mangaLam aravindAkSuniki

     mangaLam adbhUta cAritruniki mangalam Adi dEvuniki



caraNam 2



sundara varaduniki sudEhuniki brndAraka gaNa vandyuniki 

     mandara dharuniki mana mAdhavuniki shubha phaladuniki



caraNam 3



inakulamuna velasina rAmuniki janaka vacana paripAluniki 

     manasija kOTi lAvaNyuniki kanaka simhAsana nilayuniki



caraNam 4



manda nIla bhOga shayanuniki mandAkinI vara janakuniki 

     manda janaka shata sankAshuniki mandara rUpuniki hariki



caraNam 5



indrAdi aSTa digIsha nutuniki candrAditya sunayanuniki 

     gajEndruniki samrakSincina rAmacandruniki jagad rUpuniki



caraNam 6



rAja shEkhara priyuniki mauni rAja rAja pUjituniki tyAga-

     rAja vinutuniki vara gaja rAjAdhi bhakta varaduniki
